colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA @004B YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS BYED TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GI NYAMS LEN RGYUN 'KHYER DU, BTZUN GZUGS ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES, DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN 'KHYER BDE GNAD TSAD 'DUS SU BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
